channel.title: Highscores MYSQl
channel.description:
to start off with i tested it all on my localhost and it all worked but now im trying it for real it wont work my game is hosted on a vps and my website is hosted seprate.
i host my server on a vps and my website with a diffrent server i cant get them to talk to each other ive disabled the firewall on my vps allowed the ip's with remoteSQL all details are correct but when u go to login to server it takes like 15 seconds and same to logout saying it has timed out? it says
[code] at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:273) at process.run(process.java:16) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
** END NESTED EXCEPTION **
Last packet sent to the server was 0 ms ago. at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.createNewIO(Connection.java:2814) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.<init>(Connection.java:1553) at com.mysql.jdbc.NonRegisteringDriver.connect(NonRegisteringDriver.java :266) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source) at SQL.createConnection(SQL.java:14) at SQL.query(SQL.java:31) at SQL.saveHighScore(SQL.java:52) at client.logout(client.java:11707) at clickingMost.clicking(clickingMost.java:76) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:17194) at client.packetProcess(client.java:18703) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:273) at process.run(process.java:16) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.lang.NullPointerException at SQL.query(SQL.java:26) at SQL.saveHighScore(SQL.java:52) at client.logout(client.java:11707) at clickingMost.clicking(clickingMost.java:76) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:17194) at client.packetProcess(client.java:18703) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:273) at process.run(process.java:16) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Exception encountered while parsing incoming packets from Test. java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: recv failed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.packetProcess(client.java:18687) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:273) at process.run(process.java:16) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.lang.NullPointerException at SQL.destroyConnection(SQL.java:39) at SQL.query(SQL.java:30) at SQL.saveHighScore(SQL.java:49) at client.logout(client.java:11707) at PlayerHandler.saveGame(PlayerHandler.java:383) at PlayerHandler.removePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:375) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:288) at process.run(process.java:16) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) com.mysql.jdbc.CommunicationsException: Communications link failure due to under lying exception:
** BEGIN NESTED EXCEPTION **
java.net.ConnectException MESSAGE: Connection timed out: connect
STACKTRACE:
java.net.ConnectException: Connection timed out: connect at java.net.DualStackPlainSocketImpl.connect0(Native Method) at java.net.DualStackPlainSocketImpl.socketConnect(Unknown Source) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.doConnect(Unknown Source) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connectToAddress(Unknown Source) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocksSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.<init>(Unknown Source) at com.mysql.jdbc.StandardSocketFactory.connect(StandardSocketFactory.ja va:173) at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.<init>(MysqlIO.java:267) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.createNewIO(Connection.java:2739) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.<init>(Connection.java:1553) at com.mysql.jdbc.NonRegisteringDriver.connect(NonRegisteringDriver.java :266) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source) at SQL.createConnection(SQL.java:14) at SQL.query(SQL.java:31) at SQL.saveHighScore(SQL.java:49) at client.logout(client.java:11707) at PlayerHandler.saveGame(PlayerHandler.java:383) at PlayerHandler.removePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:375) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:288) at process.run(process.java:16) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
** END NESTED EXCEPTION **

item.title: Highscores MYSQl
item.dc:creator: @pk_evolution pk evolution
item.description:
@pk_evolution wrote:

to start off with i tested it all on my localhost and it all worked but now im trying it for real it wont work my game is hosted on a vps and my website is hosted seprate.

i host my server on a vps and my website with a diffrent server i cant get them to talk to each other ive disabled the firewall on my vps allowed the ip’s with remoteSQL all details are correct but when u go to login to server it takes like 15 seconds and same to logout saying it has timed out?
it says

[code]
at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:273)
at process.run(process.java:16)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

** END NESTED EXCEPTION **
